about_text:
ZUBR is a platform for observers and voters in Belarus.

Here you can find out about any of the candidates and their campaigns, any of the organizations involved in the elections, any of the members of the election commissions at any of the polling stations running in these elections.

Using the map of polling stations ZUBR, you can go out and subscribe to a detailed description of one or more of them (for example, by place of residence). This allows you to find out at any time how things are on the site. In particular, from the description of the site, you can find out whether observers are still needed on it, and, by filling out a special form, become an observer yourself.

In addition, both observers and voters can send information on the work of polling stations and commission members to ZUBR in the form of messages, photos and videos.

The goal of the ZUBR project is to record, process and display all information about the election process in Belarus in real time. This will allow every citizen of Belarus to exercise his or her suffrage to the maximum and ensure that elections are held in full compliance with the legislation of the Republic of Belarus.

We urge all citizens of Belarus to use the ZUBR platform and tell friends, family and colleagues about it!
are_you_witnessed: Have you witnessed violations in the work of the commission?
by_sending_request_message_2: By clicking the «Submit» button, you agree that your contact information will be sent to the volunteers of the «Honest People» platform. If you have already sent an application for observation through this platform, then expect feedback in a few days.
by_sending_request_message_1: By clicking the «Submit» button, you agree that your contact information will be sent to the volunteers of the «Pravo Vibaru» platform. If you have already sent an application for observation through this platform, then expect feedback in a few days.
error_occurred: Error occurred. Please try again later
have_information_about_member_activity: Share any information available about the violations committed in the professional activities of this member of the commission by going to the site page at the link below. All reliable facts about violations in the work of a commission member will be sent to international organizations involved in election observation, as well as published on the site's page.
it_is_me: It's my profile. Why I am here?
map_of_elections_in_belarus: Elections of the President of the Republic of Belarus (2020)
member_not_found: Member's page removed or not found
members_of_commission_employed_by_organi: Members of commissions employed by organization
name: Name
no_live_stream_from_station_found: The site is not equipped with a video surveillance system, but everyone can broadcast its activities to the Network. If you are a Youtube user, then create an announcement of live broadcasts on your Youtube channel (user profile is the default Youtube channel). Next, fill out the form here . The ZUBR administration will post your Youtube broadcast on the site page on the main voting day. You can broadcast the video to the site page from any device, including a smartphone.
observer_request_sent: Observation request submitted! You will be contacted in case of successful moderation
observer_verification_phone_code_incorre:
Verification error
Incorrect last 4 digits of phone number
observing_dates: What days are you ready to be an observer?
our_goals_text: The ZUBR platform was created to record, process and display all information about the election process in Belarus in real time. This will allow every citizen of Belarus to exercise his or her suffrage to the maximum and ensure that elections are held in full compliance with the legislation of the Republic of Belarus.
our_mission_text: Inform the population of Belarus in real time about the current violations of the election campaign in Belarus. Recording the suppression of civil rights during the electoral process.
page_not_found: The page was not found or the application was not updated. If you are sure that such a page exists, then please stay on it and wait for the update within ~30 seconds
ready_to_change: Ready to observe on another station
this_commission_is_not_covered_by_observ: According to ZUBR, this commission operates without independent observation. This creates the preconditions for possible falsifications. Please become an observer at this site. If you are already accredited to observe this site, then let me know . If not, click the "Watch" button and follow the further instructions.
time_left_before_campaign: seconds before the start of campaign
verification_succeed_message:
Observer verification succeed!
In the near future you will be able to use all the functionality of the ZUBR platform to register violations and publish other information about the activities of the commission on your site. Please wait for Email from the initiative «Honest People»
welcome_to_zubr: Welcome to ZUBR - a unified platform for online monitoring of the electoral process in the Republic of Belarus
why_i_am_here:
Dear {{fullName}}.
Your information and image have been used by us because you are a member of the election commission and carry out public activities of public interest. If you are NOT operating as a member of an electoral campaign for an election, and your profile posting is an error, we ask you to immediately contact the ZUBR administration.
choose_an_initiative: Choose an initiative that will help you become an observer at this station
no_connection_text:
There is no network connection!

It is possible that this is due to attempts to block the platform on the territory of the Republic of Belarus.

Please install any of the following blocking bypass tools on your device:

  • 1.1.1.1 - Google Play / AppStore
  • NordVPN - Windows / MacOS / Linux
violation_type_1: Admission of an accredited observer to the site
violation_type_2: Non-admission of an accredited observer to the site
violation_type_3: Depriving the observer of accreditation (removal from the site)
violation_type_5: Failure to comply with the terms of posting the protocol
violation_type_6: Violation of the procedure for voting by a voter at the location
violation_type_7: Discrepancy between the number of voters according to the observer's calculations and the data from the protocol of the commission
violation_type_8: Inconsistency of the design of the premises of the site with medical safety standards
incident_registered: The incident is registered. Thank you!
we_recommend_you_to_verify: We strongly recommend that you verify - messages from verified observers are given priority during processing
messages_disclaimer: ATTENTION: Materials about the course of elections posted on the site are voluntary messages from users about possible violations of electoral norms and laws, which are published without prior verification.
i_confirm_report: I confirm that the attendance data was collected for the whole day from 10.00 to 19.00
registration_of_protocol: Registration of the protocol (not necessary, but will help us)
please_upload_photo: Please upload a photo of the protocol
